rooms.description: This open-plan area integrates the entrance with a living space that flows into an adjoining open kitchen. Large windows ensure natural light.
An airy, modern kitchen layout that connects seamlessly with the living area, featuring a central island and plenty of ventilation.
A spacious studio bedroom designed as an open loft space on the split-level structure, with skylights for ample natural light.

openings.description: Large windows providing cross ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles for health and harmony.
Main entrance door following local architectural norms with a decorative archway.

garden.description: A large garden area featuring native plants and water elements to enhance the Bohemian aesthetic and ensure sustainability.

vastu_alignment.north_direction: Entrance and main windows aligned with north direction for positive energy flow.
vastu_alignment.open_spaces: The open-plan living area is positioned strategically to receive ample sunlight throughout the day, supporting natural ventilation.
